Title: toRelativeHourNum
Description: Converts a date, or date with time, to the number of hours elapsed since a certain fixed point in the past.
date — Date or date with time. Date/DateTime/DateTime64.
The number of hours from a fixed reference point in the past. UInt32.
Examples: SELECT  toRelativeHourNum(toDateTime('1993-10-05 05:20:36')) AS h1,  toRelativeHourNum(toDateTime('2000-09-20 14:11:29')) AS h2
